entry.title: Octopress
entry.content:
This looks like it is much better than Wordpress. Also I’ve now got my feet wet with Git and Ruby. Trying to write in Markdown failed me at first, had trouble finding software or gedit plugins. Looks like a lot of people use Vi (will tackle that later). Currently I’m using Eclipse with a Markdown plugin. Ruby is really fascinating to me how all the gems work. Makes me miss coding and the trill when it works as attended. While I was in middle school I spent a lot of time in VB3 writing applications for a popular online software. I like how codeacademy is setup perhaps that’s one of my next adventures.

More later, have a good day
